    Update Validator’s Metadata DApp

    Edit me

    Update Validator’s Metadata DApp

    1. In Metamask connect to the RPC endpoint of the required network:
      • Mainnet Core: https://core.poa.network
      • Testnet Sokol: https://sokol.poa.network
    2. Select your voting key in MetaMask

    NOTE: you must have a small amount of POA on your voting key to submit a transaction. During initial ceremony you must have received 0.1 POA on your initial key and can transfer it to voting key.

    1. Open URL https://validators.poa.network you should see a full list of validators who already joined the network

    2. Goto SET METADATA tab

    3. Fill all the required fields with your contact details and license info

    NOTE: title and footer of this page may be stylized differently, depending on the network you’re connected to

    1. Double-check the data you’ve provided

    2. Double-check in Metamask that you’ve selected your voting key and you’re on the required network

    3. Press SET METADATA button at the bottom of the page

    4. Confirm transaction in Metamask

    5. Wait utill transaction is mined

    6. Open PENDING CHANGES tab and verify your data in the list

    7. Ask fellow validators to confirm and finalize your request. Metadata-change request need at least 2 confirmations by different validators and then can to be finalized by any validator including yourself. Finalizing a request commits changes to the network.
